title: The Herobrine Part3-Part5
author: 末影矿工
txt_content:
本帖最后由 末影矿工 于 2014-8-8 22:43 编辑 

Part 3:村庄
我和约翰刚刚发现一个荒废的，几乎完全被遗弃的村庄。一个名叫Frank的村民在一个荒废的房子。“出什么事了?",我问。“一个人……白……眼睛……”他说。“什么?!”约翰问。“闪电……死亡……Herobrine……”

Part 4:Herobrine的故事
“他……他杀死了所有的人”,弗兰克咳嗽的道。“我们在一个不完全毁坏的小房子里找到避难所”,弗兰克不那么偏执并说出几乎完整的句子。“他称自己herobrine，及完全白色的眼睛，他杀死了我所有的朋友和……和……和做了这些。”弗兰克指着摧毁了村庄。
“他是从哪里来的？”我问。“地..地面……”村民说道。

Part 5:狩猎“这不可能是人，它肯定不是！”约翰说。“嗯，我们必须再次派人到下界，”我说，“在这里，”我给约翰一个钻石剑。“让我们狩猎这个Herobrine。”我说。
原文:
Part 3: The Village
Me and John had just found a ruined and almost completely abandoned village. A villager named Frank was in a ruined house. "What happened?" I asked. "Man...White...Eyes..." he said. "What?!" asked John. "Lightning...Death...Herobrine..."

                                                     Part 4: The Tale of Herobrine
"He...he killed everyone," coughed Frank. We had found refuge in a not completely ruined, but still a little house. Frank was not so paranoid and talking almost in complete sentences. "He called himself Herobrine, and had completely white eyes, He killed all my friends and...and...and did this." Frank gestured towards the destroyed village. "Where did he come from?" I asked. "The..the ground..." said the Villager.

                                                   Part 5: The Hunt
"This can not be Perrson, it just can't!" John said. "Well, we must send Perrson down to the Nether once again," I said, "Here," I gave John a diamond sword. "Let's hunt this Herobrine." I said.
